item.title: TIL: Copy any request as CURL command from Chrome or Firefox
item.description: :til: :firefox: :chrome: Any HTTP request performed by Friefox or Chrome can be copied as CURL command. It is possible other browsers this supports too but I had a chance to test it with those two. Open “Network” tab on Developer tools or equivalent. Load the page. Right click on desired request and select “Copy > “Copy as CURL” or similar command. This will give you CURL with parameters included. Can be useful to debug some requests.
